title: Workday CEO says AI is a 'tailwind' for the enterprise software company
description: Workday CEO Carl Eschenbach told CNBC's Jim Cramer on Wednesday that the rise of artificial intelligence is positive for his company.
content:
Workday CEO Carl Eschenbach told CNBC's Jim Cramer on Wednesday that the rise of artificial intelligence is positive for his company, pushing back against what he called a "narrative out there that AI is eating the software world."

title: ChatGPT appears to improvise when put through ancient Greek math puzzle
description: The Artificial Intelligence chatbot, ChatGPT, appeared to improvise ideas and make mistakes like a student in a study that rebooted a 2,400-year-old mathematical challenge.
content:

title: Moody's flags risk in Oracle's $300 billion of recently signed AI contracts
description: U.S. credit rating agency Moody's Ratings flagged several potential risks in Oracle Corp's $300 billion of recently signed artificial intelligence contracts, but stopped short of taking ratings action against the software giant.

title: How AI could detect signs of mental illness
description: Researchers in Japan used artificial intelligence to analyse people’s face movements and detect subtle signs of depression
content:
Artificial intelligence could be used to analyse people’s facial expressions and detect signs of depression, new research suggests.
The study, published in the journal of Scientific Reports, found that the technology was able to track micro-movements... [3032 chars]

title: AI CEO says technology ‘moving very quickly,’ could soon replace more jobs
description: By Samantha Delouya, CNN (CNN) — Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei doubled down on his warning that artificial intelligence could soon cause mass unemployment, even as the technology’s current capabilities lag behind many predictions. title: AI Rush Prompts More Investors to Increase Focus
description: India is seeing an increasing number of artificial intelligence-focused venture capital funds. They are betting on Indian founders building in AI and include areas such as consumer-facing apps, tooling, infrastructure and enterprise technology.
